balc
var balc = await contract.balanceOf(add[0])
const add = await ethers.getSigners();
var balc = await contract.balanceOf(owner[0])
const [owner] = await ethers.getSigners();
const contract = await factory.deploy();
var factory = await ethers.getContractFactory("Ter")
.exit
var factory = await ethers.getContractFactory("Ter”)
.exit
const ter = await ethers.getContractFactory("Ter”)
const ter = await ethers.getContractFactory("Ter”);
.exit
const ter = await ethers.getContractFactory("Ter”);
